FAQs: Maximizing Business Efficiency with Printer Rental from Marga Enterprises

Q1: How long can I rent a printer for?

Q2: Is technical support included?

Q3: Can I upgrade to a different printer during my rental?

Q4: Do I need to purchase toner separately?
Some plans include toner and consumables; others allow you to provide your own. Clarify this when choosing a package.
